inn1.comm: not much swing on the first ball, easily defended off the back foot
he gets off the mark with a dab to midwicket
swings in to Hales, who loves off side, but this grazes the thigh pad and they take a single
he waits on the back foot, allows this one to swing away then punches it through point beautifully.. looked just like a push but that races away
he comes forward, covers the line and allows this to go through to the keeper
another one through point! This one has more purpose in it.. He waits a touch and cracks it hard even though there isn't much room.
nice gently outswinger at 133 kph, Hales pushes it with soft hands to wide mid-off and calls for a single
this one is angled across the left-hander, easily left alone
fires this one on the blockhole straightaway.. it swings into the batsman who is able to dig it out.. was a good surprise ball at 139 kph
pushes this further away from the batsman, it takes off from a fuller length and Dhoni gathers it near his face
too wide this time, looks to angle it away but pushes it too far further
edged and through the cordon! Cook stays back and pokes at a length delivery, gets a thick outside edge which glides between the first and the third slip fielder
back of length and running across the batsman, left alone
gentle pace on this one and it come in a touch, but Hales has spotted the line early and leaves it alone
width provided! The batsman cracks it off the back foot but finds the man at point
big inswing but Hales clips off his pads to fine leg.. too straight this time
poor line from Bhuvi! He looks for that snaking delivery from the leg stump line but it doesn't swing, Cook clips it off his pads for a couple to deep square leg
stays deep in the crease and punches the back of length delivery to mid-on
walks way across the stumps.. his leg stump is visible as he dabs this to wide mid-on for a quick couple
full and on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and punches it down the pitch, past the non-striker
he comes forward and punches this on the up, straight to mid-off
this is fired on the pads, Hales misses out as this raps him on the pads.. but this was heading down leg.. 140 kph

this has gone straight up in the air! Umesh gets a wicket immediately! You have to question the choice of the shot there.. it was not that short but Hales wanted to pull it over midwicket, only gets cramped for space and gets a big top-edge that is gobbled up at midwicket
good pace there from Umesh.. this is outside off and shapes in to the left-hander a touch, taken waist high by the keeper as Cook lets it go
on the pads, Cook doesn't commit on the front foot but punches this through midwicket for a couple
confident stride forward as he pushes this length ball to the gap at cover for a single
he is not so keen to come forward, punches this length ball to mid-on off the back foot
gets a touch squared up as he is reluctant to come forward to the length delivery, defends it to cover
shuffles across the crease but uses up the room that was available had he not moved, defends this down the pitch
fuller and outside off, it keeps going away from the batsman, who has left it alone
he wants to play this to the leg side by shuffling way across to the off side, inside edge it on to his pads
he stands tall and punches the back of length firmly to cover.. Rather confident stride there by Moeen
be a u ti ful!!! Fuller outside off, yes. But he leans into it and caresses it with a wristy drive through cover
goes fishing outside off to a wide one, he is lucky not to get an edge
he waits on the back foot and punches this back of length delivery through to off
oh another superb shot! He comes forward and punches this length ball on the up through cover.. no one moves.. that is some timing
tightens the line around middle stump, the batsman punches it to mid-on
angled across the batsman, Cook lets it go through to the keeper
this one shapes in to the batsman, Cook plays it late and pushes it to mid-on off the back foot
exposes all his stumps as he walks across to the off side, defends the length delivery to off

this would have been gobbled up by second slip, but there is none. Big outside edge as Cook pushes at it away from the body.. The first slip looks at the third slip, who looks at the third slip.. they could park a truck in there
he swaps strike with a dab towards mid-on

oh no Moeen! What was the point of that shot! This is a wide length ball and Moeen throws his at at it like this is the last over of an innings.. he gets a big outside edge that is swallowed by Umesh at third man..What a waste that was
short delivery outside off, zips past Root, who sways away at the last moment
fuller on the pads, the batsman misses out as he flicks this straight to square leg
good line, some shape away from the batsman too, Root leaves it alone
he comes forward and punches this one to mid-off
comes towards the line of the ball and defends it solidly to the off side
he shuffles across and dabs this to the right of square leg for a single. There is a direct hit at the bowler's end but Root is home
fuller delivery outside off, no swing this time, the batsman leaves it alone
angles this one in to the batsman, Root is solid as he defends it to the leg side
beaten outside off! He shuffles to the off side but this swings away further to beat his defensive poke
whack! This is a touch slow and the batsman rocks back early to hammer it flat through midwicket.. superb shot
another pretty delivery! Angles in, then seams away at the last minute past the outside edge
fuller delivery aimed at off stump, the batsman comes forward and punches it with a straight bat to mid-on
length delivery on the stumps, Cook stays back and defends to midwicket
leans forward and defends this length ball down the pitch
angled across the left-hander, Cook watches if fly through to the keeper
he falls over a touch to the off side as he whips this fuller delivery to mid-on
short of length delivery on the pads, clipped easily to fine leg
that is one nicely controlled pull shot! Gets on top of the bounce, rolls his wrists and pings the gap at deep square leg for a boundary
length ball angling away from Cook, left alone easily
he waits on the back foot and defends the length ball towards point
this one comes in from back of length and Cook works it away behind square on the leg side to bring up team's 50
he waits on the back foot and punches it to the off side
short delivery outside off, takes off quite a bit and flies over the batsman
superbly balanced shot! He stands tall and punches the length delivery off the back foot, superbly hit through covers
he has to take his bottom hand off the handle as this one bounce a touch extra.. defended to off
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and defends it towards gully. That was bowled at 138 kph
good forward stride from Cook as he defends this length delivery towards point
pounds it on a shorter length, Cook waits in the back foot and defends it easily
big outside edge! Cook looks to crash it through cover point, on the up, gets a thick edge through gully for a single down to third man
he takes a tiny step forward and defends the length delivery solidly to the off side
this tails in and hits the batsman on the thigh pad as he looks to defend off the back foot..
back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it to wide mid-off for a quick single
seams away from the batsman who gets a touch squared up as he steers it to third man
he walks across to the off side and punches the back of length delivery to the left of the bowler
that's a Cook classic! Not a huge forward stride, but enough to cover the line as he caresses this through extra cover..
back of length outside off, chopped to cover point
length delivery outside off, he steers it through backward point for a single
he waits on the back foot and punches this length delivery to the off side
he waits on the back foot and punches this length delivery to cover

oh this is brilliant! He is getting better now.. Takes a tiny step forward and punches this length delivery on the up through mid-off.. that is as good a shot you will see from Cook. Straight bat, high elbow and all that jazz
waits on the back foot and steers this to backward point
fuller and angled across the stumps, the batsman leaves it alone
he is looking increasingly confident! Crashes it off the back foot but Jadeja cuts it off at point
this is the mirror image of Cook's straight drive in the last over! Not a big back lift, but just a neat economical punch.. beautiful
some width provided and Root cuts it hard, but finds the man at point
he reaches out to this widish delivery and gets an inside edge past the stumps, got a feeling that he played that one a touch too early
he waits on the back foot and defends it solidly to the off side
sooperb! Another brilliant straight drive from Root.. This is straighter and it's crunched past the non-striker for a beautiful hit
back of length outside off, defended to cover
good length, in the channel outside off, leans out and leaves alone
short and a touch wide, Cook rocks back and clunks a cut through point to the sweeper
back of a length and angling down the leg side, Root nudges it away behind square

little bit of width and Cook punches the ball towards cover point on the front foot, Jadeja makes a terrific stop... and there's an awful mix-up between Root and Cook, who was watching the ball, the former is sent scurrying back and would have been out with a direct hit
short, at the body, flicked away for a comfortable single this time
gets forward and defends length ball on off stump
around the wicket, tossed up and Cook dabs into a gap at cover for one
goes back and flicks one off the legs
floated on off stump, leans around the front pad and works square
length ball straightening on the stumps, Root shuffles across and taps to the leg side
flighted, Root staying the the crease, again can't work the ball past midwicket
on the stumps, flicks this around the corner past leg slip for a single
tossed up, outside off, goes back and squirts the ball to backward point
flighted around off stump, gets on to the front foot and pushes a single to long-off
around the wicket to Cook, who is struck on the pad, big appeal from the bowler but Richard Kettleborough shakes his head, adjudging it to be going down past leg stump
tossed up on off, leans into a push towards cover, well stopped though the wayward throw almost gifts England a run
dabbed into the covers again
drops back in the crease, works one more off his pads behind square
angled in with the arm and Cook is again struck on the pad, playing back as the ball skidded on, didn't turn enough, though
sweeps and gets a high top edge this time! Loops beyond short fine leg and lands safely, big swing across the line from Cook but couldn't keep it down
pushed across the right-hander, who steers the ball square
goes back and flicks one through backward square
tossed up and straightening on middle, Cook prods gently towards mid-on
slightly short from Aswhin, Cook busily shovels this in front of square, they pick up a couple to the man in the deep
length ball, goes back and slices the ball along the ground to backward point
flighted outside off, Root is down on one knee to punch into the covers
floated up on the stumps, comes forward, dabs a single down the ground to long-on
around the wicket, Cook plays around his pad through mid-on, another easy single
tossed up, on the stumps, punched down the ground and the diving Raina can't cut it off

spun out, Cook top-edges a sweep straight up in the air! England's captain didn't heed the warning from the previous over, falls short of a half-century, that's the end of a miserable series for him. At least he was trying to be positive I suppose
flighted on the stumps, Root comes forward and pushes one to long-on
angled in to the left-hander, tapped back down the track
on the stumps, length ball worked away behind square on the leg side
tossed up, Root stays in the crease and turns to leg
on the front foot, smothers the ball and again pushes to midwicket
tight line, tossed up and worked to the leg side, can't get it through again
played back to the bowler on the front foot
turn for Raina, this grips and spins past Morgan's outside edge as he pushes forward in defence
length ball from around the wicket, opens the face and runs square
comes forward and flicks wristily down the ground through mid-off
outside off, skidding on, Root drops back and picks a gap in the covers
tossed up on the stumps and played defensively back down the pitch
goes back and flicks to leg, straight to midwicket again
half an appeal for a stumping, as Root pushes forward to be beaten outside off, the foot was fractionally raised but Dhoni didn't quite get his timing right in whipping off the bails
slightly shorter, forces this away through the leg side to the sweeper
comes on to the front foot and pushes back down the track
tossed up, attempts the reverse-sweep but can't beat backward point
off-stump line and straightening a touch, Morgan defends it respectfully
goes back outside off and chops into the ground, can't get it through the infield
on the stumps, played with the turn through square leg
flighted, Morgan gets on to the front foot and whips his hands through a cover drive
stays in the crease and nurdles one more behind square on the leg side
excellent hands from Morgan, quickly reversing the bat and clattering the ball over backward point, cleared the jumping fielder for a rare boundary - hundred up for England
comes forward and picks up one more through mid-off
definite spin for Ashwin, beats the forward defensive, turned appreciably and past the off stump
tossed up, Morgan punches one down the ground
this spins plenty too, though down the leg side as Root stayed back
touch short, on the stumps and flicked behind square for a couple
on the stumps, pushes this into the leg side
length ball, straightening and played with the turn to the leg side
flighted, gives this a bit more air outside off, Root drives half forwards, well fielded at cover
uses the feet and pushes a single down the ground
angled in with the arm from around the wicket, played back to the bowler
Root goes across his stumps and flicks a single through square leg
tossed up, comes forward and punches one more back past the bowler
Root skips forwards, finds a gap in the covers, another single to rotate the strike
some turn for Jadeja and this loops towards leg slip, cries of "catch it!" from the bowler... but it runs away for a single. Think there was a thin edge on to thigh pad
length ball, straightening and defended back to the bowler
Morgan nearly gets in a tangle trying to reverse-sweep again, hits the gloves and loops up in front of the wicket, Dhoni can't get there
opens the face, tries to steer the ball through point
on off stump, watches it on to the bat in defence
tossed up on middle and leg stump, tapped into the leg side
down the leg side, Morgan sweeps at it, maybe a flick of glove as it's not called wide, he's not far from dragging the ball on to his own stumps, even though Dhoni misses it. Dangerous times
angled in towards the stumps, Root works the ball away in front of square leg
over the wicket and Morgan nearly flicks the ball straight to Raina at leg slip again, as he did at Edgbaston... just went too quickly past the fielder
back around the wicket, Root uses his feet, punches down the ground
on the stumps, defended
can't gets this away through midwicket
tossed up, Morgan comes forward and pushes a single to long-on
spin and bounce this time, Morgan flummoxed trying to cut off the back foot, the ball nestles in Dhoni's gloves
angled in, covers the line and any spin, blocks
gets on to the front foot and defends
shortens his length slightly, this time Morgan goes back and dead-bats it
flighted, around the line of off, leans out to defend - Morgan just can't get Ashwin away here

tries to use the feet, there's spin again... stumped him! Like a fly caught in the web, Morgan has been struggling, fighting, now he's been put out of his misery. Good work from Dhoni, finished the job with Morgan a yard out of his crease, forlornly trying to get his foot back
lovely stroke form Root, gets on the front foot and leathers a drive through the covers for a rare boundary
pushed back down the track
slightly short, goes back and punches past the bowler to long-on
tossed up, plays on the back foot, punches to Raina along the ground
comes forward and works this wider, through mid-on for a single to get off the mark
flighted around off stump, Root gets forward and dabs one more down the ground
he doesn't have much clue about that as he pushes inside the line of this turning delivery
chooses reverse sweep now, goes along the spin and whips it through cover point for a boundary
not really intended to hit it to long-on, he was aiming to the off side but gets an inside edge down the ground
punched down the pitch, the bowler dives to his left to cut it off
he walks back and punches it to deep square leg for a single
fuller on the middle stump, the batsman gets an inside edge behind square on the leg side
he comes forward and pushes this to midwicket
fuller on the pads, he looks to flick but plays it straight to the leg gully fielder
flatter this time, the batsman comes forward to push it down the pitch
takes a step down the pitch and whips this legsidish delivery behind square off his pads
he brings up his half-century with a flick to midwicket.. continues to be the one bright silver lining
he stays back and punches it through cover for a single
slower and tossed up, the batsman comes forward and pushes it down the pitch
opens his stance and looks to hit inside out, chips it over cover for a single.. Not entirely in control though
that spin again! This one beats the outside edge after pitching on the middle stump and just misses the off stump
he comes forward and pushes it down the ground to long on for a single
slower again, gets that turn outside off, Buttler steers it straight to point
he leans forward and punches this to extra cover, straight to the fielder
this is smartly played! He waits for the tossed up delivery and squeezes it out through backward point
goes on the back foot and clips it behind square for a single
flatter and shorter, the batsman works it away to deep square leg for a single
stays back and cuts this shorter delivery through backward point for a couple of runs. Still no boundary
he comes forward and flicks the tossed up delivery to deep midwicket for a single
loud appeal as this one jags back from length and hits the batsman on the pads.. just a touch high. He keeps targetting the stumps like always
he waits on the back foot and nudges it to the left of backward point for a quick single
stays back and takes a quick single to cover. Kohli fires a throw as the striker's end, misses, and allows an extra run
shuffles across and looks to drive the fuller delivery through mid-on but gets a thick inside edge on to his pads.. Shami was aiming for the off and middle stump again
slightly slower this time, the batsman comes forward and defends the length delivery to point
fuller on the stumps, this time Root gets it on the middle as he flicks through midwicket . Doesn't have the legs to make it to the boundary though
fires in the yorker on leg stump, hits the toe and rolls to short fine leg. There was a half-hearted appeal there, but it was slipping down leg
hit-me delivery! This is on a fuller length outside off, giving Buttler the space and time to roll up his sleeves and cook one over mid-off for  a bounday
geez! That has travelled all the way over the boundary.. Buttler goes for a full-blooded cut off a widish delivery and gets a thick top-edge. the pace on that takes it over the third man fielder
back of length outside off, he cuts it firmly in front of square but Ashwin dives to his right and keeps them to a single
slower delivery outside off, Root waits an extra second and steers it down to third man
good slower delivery this time, the batsman plays inside the line. Dhoni pads it in but can't prevent a single
he is taking him on, goes for the reverse sweep, gets a top-edge but this runs down short third-man area and down to the boundary
looks to work this flatter delivery to the leg side but gets beaten by the turn, it hits his thigh pad
leans forward and pushes it to cover
stays back and defends this flatter one to the off
goes deep in the crease and pushes it straight to extra cover
he leans forward and eases it to long off for a single
he looks to punch it through off, but gets an outside edge at this angled delivery, that runs to the boundary
big spin into the batsman, Buttler looks to push it through the off side but gets hit on the pads
shorter this time, and Buttler is quick to pounce on it.. pulls it had through square leg for a boundary
this is really poor! It is shorter than short and Buttler whacks it over cow corner.. Deep into the stands
tossed up this time, he pushes it straight to midwicket
he waits on the back foot and nudges it to square leg for a single
reverse sweep again, this one goes for more runs to deep backward point
goes back and defends it to cover
he leans forward and eases it to long off
stretches out and drives it down to long off
whoa! England are taking the spinner on.. Tosses up delivery, this has been powerfully slogged over the cow corner.. huge hit
he pushes forward and punches it to long off
and he continues leaking runs.. tossed up delivery outside off and it's creamed through cover.. 50 from the Powerplay
flatter outside off, cuts it straight to backward point
he wanted to flick it through leg side, but can't beat midwicket
this is good running! He dabs it to square leg with soft hands and comes back for a couple. A straighter throw and he would have been in trouble
slogged across the line, to deep midwicket on the bounce
appeal for lbw as he misses a straighter one, but that was going over.. runs down fine on the off side
reverses the hands, reaches out and paddles to backward point... Nearly missed that one
comes forward and pushes into the covers
flighted, Root goes down on one knee and plays a controlled slog-sweep out towards wide long-on
shorter, skidding on, Buttler plays to the fielder in the covers
goes back and pushes a single in front of square on the off side
tossed up, slightly too full again, Root climbs into a lofted sweep, in front of deep midwicket and this time had enough power to beat the chasing man to the rope
starts with a low full toss, Buttler backs away and clubs towards mid-off for one
better length, in the channel outside off, Root drops back and opens the face to run one down to third man
full length, right in the blockhole, big swing and forces the ball through mid-on - that's the 100 partnership up, from 75 balls
pitched up again, busy footwork from Root, clips a single through midwicket
another superb yorker from Shami, following Buttler to leg, can only squeeze one into the leg side
full and straight, chops across the line, towards midwicket backpedalling... an over of singles, which India will certainly take at this stage
fullish and turning, takes the edge but slides between an unmoving Dhoni and slip, runs away for four!
comes forward, thinks about the slog-sweep but the ball isn't full enough changes his mind and pushes into the covers

tries to reverse sweep and hit on the pads, big appeal, not given... but Buttler has wandered blindly off down the pitch and is run out by a mile! The impact was probably outside off stump, the ball only bobbled a yard or two wide of Dhoni but for reasons unknown Buttler decided there was a run to be taken. Dhoni nonchalantly reached to his right, picked up the ball and broke the stumps, Buttler shot down short of his fifty
over the wicket, watches the ball turning in and pushes back down the track
pushed through outside off, drops back and cuts along the ground to point
angled in and played back on the on side
pitched up on middle and off, bunted down the ground towards long-on to take Root on to 97
short ball, taking the pace off it too, Stokes had already begun to duck as it looped gently past his head
good length outside off stump, Stokes defends watchfully from the crease
low full toss from Shami, searching for the yorker, Stokes connects well and whips the ball wide of a diving mid-on to pick up a boundary
back of a length, cutting the fingers over the ball again, driven through the covers off the back foot
another full toss, Root swings to leg... and sends it straight to midwicket along the ground. Missed out
Jadeja continues, over the wicket to Stokes, goes back and clips the ball with the turn through square leg
full and flighted, dipping on off, Root uses the feet but picks out extra cover on the drive
tossed up straighter, spinning as Root rolls out the slog-sweep again... the ball bounces over the blade and over the top of middle, too!

gives this some air, Root bravely unfurls the same shot... nails it, over the rope at deep midwicket, huge cheers around the ground as Yorkshire celebrates a century for one of their own. Root's second ODI hundred, been a cracking knock
flatter, outside off, reverses the hands and gets a bit of luck, gloving the ball past slip and this will run away for four more

tossed up, now Root goes down town, gets to the pitch and smokes the ball over long-off, clears the fielder as he leaps beyond the rope... Big over for England, Root has the pedal firmly clamped to the metal
back of a length, cut firmly to backward point, it's stopped but they pick up one anyway

goes across his stumps, scoops... but straight to short fine leg! Root goes for 113, a rattling good innings though England would have loved him to still be there at the end. Tried to be a bit too cute, the ball was a half-volley on off stump, instead of hitting down the ground he ramped it softly to the fielder on the edge of the ring
gets this full and up towards Woakes bootstraps, digs it out but mid-on runs across to prevent a single
slightly full in the channel, Woakes goes for the booming cover drive - and misses completely

short ball, maybe another slower one, Woakes diverts it in the air through backward point, very nearly a brilliant diving catch but Jadeja just gets fingertips to it, third man can't get around to prevent four
good delivery from Shami, up in the blockhole and Woakes digs it out towards the bowler, has to regain his ground sharply
around the wicket, length ball and Stokes dances out to plonk this into the sightscreen! Brutal, clean strike through the line and it sailed beyond the rope for the sixth six of England's innings
comes forward again, drags his line down a touch, blocks it into the covers for one
slightly short and outside off, Woakes rocks back and Foghorn-Leghorns it through point for four more! Powerful stroke
tossed up, driven back down the ground this time
pushed flat and towards leg stump, attempted reverse sweep but Stokes misses, maybe flicked the pad on its way to Dhoni
on the stumps, Stokes drops right back and thrashes the ball to Jadeja at cover, who stops it even as he began to turn away
pitched up just outside off, Woakes drives and is beaten, Dhoni ensures they don't think about byes
super delivery, tailing in towards off stump and Woakes flails at it again, wasn't enough room for the shot
bulls eye! Another yorker and this time bang on middle stump, Woakes wasn't worried about his toes, having stepped away, but was summarily cleaned up
full again, perfect death bowling from Shami, squeezed behind square and Tredwell was struggling if the throw to the other end had been on target
pitched up, Stokes digs the ball out through mid-off for one more
attempted yorker, not quite full enough and Tredwell smacks it through extra cover for four! He went right back into the crease, turned it into a half-volley... though still a top over from Shami
starts with a wonky full toss wide, completely lost that, in the tramlines outside off
pitched up in the channel; Stokes crumps it forcefully in front of deep midwicket and they get back for a second
slower ball, Stokes mistimes his heave to leg, hit on the body
full toss, gets away with it as Stokes toe-ends it to mid-off
this one goes, Stokes spots the slower ball and Manic Street Preachers it hiiiiiiiiiiiiigh into the crowd at deep backward square leg
loses his line again, full, wayward and wide of the off stump
straighter, clubbed down the ground to long-on
takes the pace off again, Tredwell scuffs the ball towards mid-off, they steal one more
low full toss outside off stump, Tredwell swats it through point to the man in the deep
goes full and straight-ish again, Stokes tries to ramp the ball over fine leg but misjudges it, hit on the pad
this time it comes off, subtly played by Stokes, leaning down and flicking a full delivery wide of Dhoni for four
on a length, Stokes begins to advances, tries to crash this over the leg side, screws away along the ground to long-on
backs away, pitched up outside off, Tredwell slaps one more through point

oh, unlucky for Dhawan, Stokes finishes with a boundary as his heave to leg hits a practice pitch and bounces over the fielder's shoulder, Tim Flowers-style... That finishes a decent effort from England and means India will need 295 to win

inn2.comm: length delivery at 128 kph on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends it to off
he leans forward and defends the length delivery towards midwicket. Not much movement for Anderson at the moment
that's the start England were after! Rahane pushes at this wider length delivery and slices it straight to point. A touch of laziness in that shot.
a big appeal immediately as Kohli plays outside the line and gets rapped high on his pads.. It was on the middle stump line but would have gone over
he pushes nervously at this length delivery and plays it to point
pushed too far down the leg side and it's a wide. Not a bad ploy though as Virat is falling a touch to the off side..
some extra bounce for Jimmy, the batsman takes his bottom hand off the bat as he defends
he gets off the mark with a neat nudge behind square off a back of length delivery
he steers this through to third man but not entirely in control. It was pushed in the air through the vacant gully region as this got a touch big on him
angled across the left-hander, who comes forward and lets this one through
this runs to the boundary behind point but this is off the edge! It's full on off stump and the batsman plays a touch inside the line.. ends up getting a thick-ish outside edge through point
he comes solidly behind the line of this length ball and defends it to cover
wider this time from the bowler, Dhawan shows no interest in playing this

fired on the pads again and Kohli flicks it to deep backward square leg! Hello, Kohli wants a second and runs down half way down the pitch.. has to turn and head back..and he slips too .. he is lucky that Buttler's throw to the bowler was wayward.. He would have struggled had Buttler taken his time
back of length delivery, that takes off from the pitch, the batsman leaves it alone
he waits and opens the face to run it down to third man for a single
shuffles across the crease and comes behind the line of the ball to defend it solidly towards mid-on
length delivery a bit wide outside off, it shapes away too but Kohli doesn't want to poke at it, leaves it alone
he takes a step down the pitch and defends the length delivery towards point. He is not looking the most confident at the moment
bowls it just short of length outside off, Dhawan covers the stumps and lets it go through
confident punch as the batsman comes forward to the length delivery and pushes it to mid-off
he is staying patient for now, leaves this angled delivery alone
leans forward and punches this fuller delivery firmly to off, but hits it straight to extra cover
back of length delivery across the batsman, Dhawan seems confident today even when he leaves them alone
third time in this over, he drives one firmly but third time, he finds the fielder. This one hit straight to extra cover again
he shuffles across the crease and whips the length delivery past midwicket. That is a neat push and it beats the fielder to the boundary.
length delivery outside off, Kohli wants to punch it on the up but gets an inside edge on to his pads
short of length delivery, he hops on his toes and guides it down third man
waits on the back foot before punching the back of length delivery down the pitch
the last innings has done him a world of good! This is full on the pads and Dhawan punches it beautifully through midwicket
good solid defence as he leans forward and pushes the length delivery down the pitch
fires in a yorker on off, the batsman digs it out towards point
poor delivery! This is on the pads and it's helped along the way by a fine glance.. that runs away to the boundary at a quick pace
solid this time. Woakes pitches it on a length around off and Kohli pushes it towards mid-on with a straight bat
leans forward and punches this firmly to extra cover, straight off the middle
he comes forward and defends the 140kph delivery down to mid-on
stays back to this 137 kph short of length delivery and opens the face to steer it past backward point for a quick couple
marginally short of length at 135 kph, Dhawan goes back to play the cut but cannot beat point
length delivery outside off, the batsman waits and glides it to third man for a single
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and defends it to point
length delivery, a touch closer to off stump, Kohli defends it down the pitch
the sucker ball! Anderson pushes it full and wide outside off, with a bit of shape, asking Kohli to drive.. which he does, but misses it completely

we have seen it a few times this summer! Eighth time this summer, Anderson gets Kohli. This is short of length just outside off, Kohli pokes at that from the crease and gets a thick outside edge. Cook at first slip dives low to his right and completes a regulation catch
he comes forward and punches this length delivery on the up, past the non-striker for a quick single
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward before leaving it alone
he is squared up as he defends this back of length delivery, pushed to backward point
a repeat of the shot that got Moeen out today! Dhawan chases a wider delivery with hard hands and gets a thick outside edge that almost carries to third man
fuller delivery on the pads at 140 kph, the batsman defends it to midwicket
he waits on the back foot and defends the short-ish delivery down the pitch
length delivery on the middle stump line, the batsman whips it to deep square leg for a single
stays stuck in the crease and defends the back of length delivery down the pitch.. he was a touch surprised by the inward movement on that
now he plays for the angle but the ball moves away, beating the outside edge
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman sways away from the line
he pushes forward and defends the length delivery back to the bowler
more defence as he comes forward and pushes the length delivery to off side
he comes forward and leaves this angled delivery alone.. It was quite close to the off stump
yorker length delivery outside off, the batsman digs it out down the pitch
that's a cracker! This is short and wide and he gets on top of that, hammering it between the short cover point fielder and backward point
back of length outside off, he comes forward and defends it to point
he keeps coming forward and defends this to Cook at the short cover point position
lot of meat on that shot as Dhawan leans on this fuller delivery and punches it past the bowler's left. It races away after crossing the mid-on fielder
he walks down the pitch, creating some room in the process, and guides the back of length delivery past backward point
he looks to defend this length delivery to off, but inside edge it on to his boot
stays back to the back of length ball, defends it to point
short ball from Anderson, Dhawan sways out of line
stands tall and drops the short-ish delivery with soft hands to the off side
he clips it off his hips for a single down to fine leg
tossed up outside off, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
quicker and flatter, Dhawan comes forward to defend but this turns past the outside edge
skips out of the crease but has to defend as he is not close to the pitch of the ball
comes of the crease again and drives it calmly down to long off for a single
tossed up on the stumps, Rayudu defends it to midwicket
pushed down to long on for a single
length delivery on off at 131 kph, the batsman defends it towards the non-striker
he drives this fuller delivery firmly, but this has been hit straight to the fielder at cover
back of length this time, there is enough room for the batsman to go back and steer it down to third man
bowls length on the stumps, Dhawan defends it to bowler's left
wrong line! this is short of length and down the leg side, Dhawan whips it fine but it's cut off by the fine-leg fielder
superb delivery! Rayudu plays for the angle but this straightens to beat the outside edge
he uses his feet to get to the pitch of this one, but flicks it straight to midwicket
leading edge! He closes the bat face too early and it lobs up to the off side.. just short of the man at point
extends his arms and slogs this one over midwicket! He played such shots towards the latter half of the last match.. massive hit
leans forward and defends it solidly down the pitch
comes down the pitch and defends it back to the bowler

slog and thwack! But it's the kind that makes the bowler happy.. Dhawan tries to repeat the shot and Moeen smartly slows it down. As the bat swings across, it just meets thin air. The ball then walks past and strikes the middle
quick delivery, 87 mph, this one kicks up from the surface and Buttler takes it quite high after the batsman has left it alone
he comes forward and punches it on the up to deep extra cover
tight lines just outside off, Rayudu stays back and defends it down the pitch

this is getting a little frantic! Oh no.. Dropped by Woakes! Rayudu gives the bowler the charge and tries to go downtown, but gets a thick outside edge that balloons for the charging third-man.. He gets there, but then can't hang on to it.. Easy chance there..
length delivery, Raina leaves it alone.. not too far from off stick
dropped again! Raina survives as Cook at first slip can't hang on to a waist high chance to his left. He dived, got both hand, but closes his palms too early.. the ball isn't there.
around the wicket, tossed up, pushed into the covers
tossed up, bat tight to front pad and defended in front of middle and off
pushed through a bit flatter outside off, played square off the back foot
tossed up, gets on the front foot to defend
walks out to meet a length ball, taps a single to long-off
over the wicket, stays in the crease and flicks safely through backward square
short of a length, hops back on the stumps and drops a single in front of square
bit of width, fast hands from Raina, weight back and cutting the ball hard, but smartly stopped by Morgan at point
stays back and pushes to Finn's left, he collapses in his follow through and gets a hand on it
shortish, stays in the crease and pushes to mid-off

length ball on middle and leg, Raina tries to flick to midwicket and somehow manages to pop it just over the head of Anderson at mid-on... He maybe could have tried to follow it a bit further, before jumping, but couldn't get to it and Raina survives again
stays in the crease and pushes a length ball into the off side
length ball, spinning to leg, played with soft hands into the ground through square
comes forward and pushes a single down the ground
flatter, outside off, opens the face but runs the ball straight to short third man
tossed up, worked into the midwicket region, they think about two but won't get a second
Raina drops back, slides the ball off the face, Finn makes a good stop a short third man but they pick up one
flighted outside off, walks out, closes the face to the man at midwicket
slightly too full, in the slot outside off and Raina gets forward to stroke a cover drive to the fence. Lovely timing
shorter and straighter, nudged down to fine leg for a single
good length on off stump, tapped back to the leg side, mid-on prevents a run
full and on the stumps, on-drive from Rayudu past the bowler, not powerfully struck and Anderson runs from mid-off to long-on to field
shortish, outside off, steered to backward point
goes deep in the crease and this time guides the ball a bit finer for a single
appeal from Moeen for lbw as Rayudu sweeps, not sure if it hit pad or glove but was probably heading down leg
wide of the stumps this time, Rayudu makes room, big swing but toe-ends one down the ground
lets this run across him, covering the spin and steering behind square
uses the feet, skips out and drags the ball through midwicket
Raina gets out to the pitch, nice high elbow and lofts the ball over the infield, long-off has to run to his right but it was hit so sweetly they still only got one
sixer from Rayudu! Came waltzing down the track, clean strike through the line and sends the ball soaring straight back over Moeen's head
around the wicket to the left-hander, tossed up and spanked through the covers, super strokeplay from Raina, pierced the gap and that's another boundary
flighted, on the stumps, gets down to sweep hard, straight to the man in the deep
skips out, carts this high over midwicket, between the two men in the deep, lovely placement on that - intimidatory stuff from these two
flatter, outside off, shows this a straight bat in defence
gets down the pitch and works the ball back past Tredwell to long-on
this bounces a bit more, from around the wicket, Raina dabs it down on to the pitch
tossed up, Rayudu launches into a cover drive, picks out the fielder
length ball, goes back and plays with the turn for a single through square leg
quickish and straightening on off stump, pushed into the covers

faster, bounces a touch - takes the top edge, Raina goes! Not sure if this was a long hop or a pseudo-bouncer from Moeen, it was definitely dragged down, Raina went back to cut and the ball Jack-in-the-boxed through to the keeper, via a chunk of bat
length ball, spinning a touch on leg stump, Dhoni flicks and is hit on the pad, outside the line
flighted and drifting across to off stump, pushed fine of mid-off, but the dive cuts off a single
thrums in to the crease, slightly back of a length, Rayudu defends from the crease
on off stump, defended down into the ground again, sets off for one but almost immediately turns back as the fielder swoops from cover
short ball at the ribs, nicely dealt with off the back foot, works one through square leg
short ball, basically an 83mph half-tracker, Dhoni comfortably swats it down to fine leg
rising off a length, Rayudu plays watchfully into the leg side
tight line from Finn, shortish and keeping the batsman on the back foot, defended
stays back to a length ball, skids on a little low, manages to drop the bat on it
comes forward, flicks across the line towards midwicket
length ball on leg stump, dabbed through square, just a single as the fielder comes in off the boundary
flat, 59mph and spins a touch, hits the front pad as Rayudu pushes forward defensively
on the stumps, gets low and paddles the ball through backward square
length ball, outside leg stump, Dhoni glances it away for one more - England have got a lid back on the scoring
length ball in the channel outside off, Dhoni watches this zip through to the keeper
short ball, maybe rolls the fingers on it a touch, Dhoni mistimes the pull, the ball dipping in front of Buttler but he manages to stop it
fullish on off stump, bottom-handed poke to mid-off as Dhoni crabs forwards
genuine bouncer this time, only 82mph on the gun but it climbs past Dhoni as he aborts the pull, taken by Buttler at head height
fuller length again, pushes tentatively into the covers
length outside off, stays back and jabs the ball towards point, early call of "No!" - maiden from Finn
nicely played, lets this drift across him from around the wicket, plays a wristy late cut behind point and it runs away to the fence
Moeen goes over the wicket, on off stump and a little slower, hits high up the bat as Rayudu presses forwards
quicker, on the stumps, again plunges forward to block
pushed through on the stumps, uses his feet and works the ball past short midwicket for a single
darted in towards middle and leg, Dhoni taps to the midwicket fielder
length ball, not much turn and Dhoni flicks the ball with the angle to deep backward square
length on the pads, Dhoni gives him the charge and flicks in the air over midwicket, finds the sweeper
full length, Rayudu also uses the feet, lashes the ball down the ground, diving stop from mid-off keeps them to one
angled in on the stumps, beats the bat on the inside and thunks pad, drops on to the pitch as Stokes runs down to field
blap! No foot movement from Dhoni, just set himself for the length ball and walloped it high out towards wide long-off, dropped short of the rope but enough power to bounce away for four
Stokes holds his nerve, length ball on the stumps, turned to the leg side
goes back and turns a shortish ball through backward square leg
hurried through on the stumps, flicked away to deep midwicket
flat, on the stumps, worked off the pads through square
angled in, dropped short into the leg side, they scurry one more as the fielder tosses wide at the bowler's end
drags his length down, Rayudu comes out but can only push back to the bowler
on the attack again, Rayudu gets under this one, malicious swing of the bat and smokes the ball into the sightscreen, another six for that man
n the stumps, glanced through square for another single
length ball outside off, swings from the hips and guides one behind square
off-stump line, Dhoni clears the front foot but can only find mid-on with a clubbed drive
short ball, over the stumps and Dhoni hops back awkwardly, nudges behind square
premeditated move from Rayudu, Stokes aims for the inside tramline... Just misses it
shuffles forward again, defends a short ball over off stump
half-tracker, skips down the track and pulls like a baseball slugger through midwicket, picked an unguarded area of the pitch and that will run away
stays back, nudges a single into the leg side - fifty for Rayudu, his second of the series
tossed up on off stump, uses the feet but gets an inside edge to the leg side
on the stumps, worked into the leg side
begins to come forward, drops shorter, dabbed back defensively
angled in, flicked away through square leg
tight lines from Tredwell, varying his length, Dhoni settles for another single
goes down on one knee, attempted slog but he cloths it, bounces short of the man at deep midwicket
he comes forward and defends this down the pitch

ooh la la! Rayudu can only hit it as far as mid-on! He was looking for a big hit over midwicket but this one came quicker of the surface and hurried Rayudu on the pull. That he was charging down the pitch didn't help either. It only gets as far as mid-on where Cook back-pedals and takes a simple catch
he leans forward and gets off the mark with a push to long off
cramps him for room with a short of length delivery, Dhoni tucks it to square leg for a single
he tucks it to midwicket and looks for a quick single, but his friend Anderson charges in and wipes out the thoughts with a quick throw
angled across the batsman, Jadeja leaves it alone
he stays back and punches it firmly, can't beat cover
biffed! Just a neat flick of the wrists.. this is powered over deep midwicket. He shimmies down the pitch to get close and hits long range
takes a couple of steps towards the ball and tucks it to square leg for a single
waits on the back foot and defends it to off
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman takes off for a single to midwicket
slapped through mid-on.. rewind back to Lord's if you want to visualise the shot.. Charges down the pitch and flat-bats it through mid-on
looks to slice the length ball through to third man but makes not contact with the ball
no room from Stokes, the batsman defends it down the pitch
fuller this time, Jadeja pushes it to mid-off and scampers through for a quick one
this is too far down the leg side. He was attempting the slower one there probably and lost direction
not too far from the fielder at point! This was full and wide, Dhoni looks to drive it through cover but ends up slicing it behind point
dances down the pitch and whips the low full toss to deep square leg for asingle
tossed up delivery from round the wicket, the batsman defends it down the pitch
slower on the pads, Jadeja dabs it to the leg side and calls fora quick single
he stays back and defends this quicker delivery down the pitch
takes a step down the pitch but Tredwell shortens his length, this is defended
now he bowls it full and on the pads, Dhoni digs it out to the leg side for a single
quicker delivery meets Jadeja's solid forward defence
back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman tucks it behind square for a quick single
digs this one short but it flies way over the batsman's head, easy call for the umpire
no room to work with. This is short of length on off stump, Jadeja chops it towards the wicketkeeper
straight again from Finn, Dhoni gets cramped for room and tucks it to square leg for a single
short delivery, but this is down the leg side, Jadeja gets on top of it and pulls it down to fine leg
good tight short delivery, the batsman is not able to get it off the square. Tight first over from Finn
they are targetting Jadeja's body with short of length deliveries. The batsman wanted to tuck it to the leg side but gets smacked on the thigh pad

short ball again, but this is slightly off target.. a bit too much on the leg side and Jadeja swivels and pulls it down to the fine-leg boundary. The fielder is up in the circle there.. So smart choice of shot
fuller delivery, he chips it over the infield for a couple of runs to wide long on
he is getting a move on..Woakes bowls an offcutter wide outside off - it sits up nicely for Jadeja to whack through point for a boundary
he comes forward and smartly turns the strike over with a push to mid off
and Dhoni tucks it close to the pitch on the leg side and hares across for a single
he shuffles across to get inside the line of this short of length delivery and clips it to fine leg for a single
no room given to Jadeja, but this is really quick running.. The men on the leg side are deep and Jadeja takes off for two to square leg
short on the body, Jadeja plays the swivel-pull down to fine leg
fuller length outside off, Dhoni pushes it straight to the man at point

he gives it away! Short and wide, should have either been left as it would have been a wide, or should have been slapped over the infield... Dhoni is disappointed though as he toe-ends this straight into the hands of the cover fielder. He had to reach out for that and couldn't control it.. Good low catch by the fielder, but Finn knows this was a gift for him..
back of length delivery, the batsman defends it to point off the back foot
length delivery outside off, Anderson's friend pushes it to cover
no room for Jadeja, he defends it down the pitch
'when in doubt, step out'. Jadeja does that all the time.. but he is not able to push it past mid-off
short ball aimed at the throat, Jadeja plays it well, rolling his wrists as he plays it to fine leg
oozes class as he pulls this calmly to deep square leg
he keeps the strike with a single to square leg. Good bowling by Jimmy, no room provided
that hits him on the pads as Jadeja misses the flick to the leg side.. that pitched outside leg and was going over

fuller delivery on the off stump line, the batsman pushes it to cover where Moeen makes a diving stop. Jadeja takes off for a single, Ash is a little late to respond but chugs along to make it through
stands tall and whips this stylishly to midwicket. He has so much time when he plays
back of length on the body, Ashwin flicks it off his hips for a single to deep midwicket
fires it on the blockhole, but this is more of a half-volley on the pads, whipped to deep midwicket
he shuffles across to the off side and defends the back of length delivery to midwicket
he steps out of the crease but Anderson pitches it short and cramps the batsman for room, the batsman chops it to point for a single
short and wide outside off, Ashwin cuts it late to third man and calls for a couple.. but he has to dive to make it in
he waits on the back foot and guides this back of length delivery to third man
length delivery on the pads, Jadeja flicks it to deep backward square leg for a quick couple. England won't mind those
makes a lot of room by moving outside leg but he gets chased by Anderson, he then dabs it to midwicket for a single
leading edge goes in the gap at cover! Ashwin was looking to flick it through midwicket but survives
drops back and glides a length ball to third man
fullish, on leg stump, Jadeja clips it through midwicket but can't get back for a second as Stokes runs in off the boundary and rifles a throw
touch full, off stump, reaches around his pad, dabs into the leg side, fielder quickly on it
back of a length, Ashwin hacks across the line, the ball flies off in the opposite direction, plenty of hangtime but bounces a few yards in front of third man
pitched up outside off, Jadeja bunts the ball into the ground towards mid-off
full length again, 86mph on middle and leg, Ashwin steps away and picks a drive through the covers
sneaky from Anderson, full-blooded action but cutting the fingers over the ball, Ashwin swings wildly
length outside off, hits the seam and zips through as Ashwin attempts to dislocate his shoulder, misses again
another slower ball, Ashwin times this, in the air for a while but in front of deep cover and that will be four, thankyouverymuch
back of a length, popped into the leg side, again aerial but lands safely
another slower short delivery, Jadeja has time to size it up but whups it straight to fine leg on the bounce
short ball, taking the pace off again, Ashwin dabs adroitly to the leg side and trots the single
short of a length, on the stumps, pulled into the ground down to fine leg - 200 up for India (though the crowd still very subdued)
length ball on middle and leg, worked through midwicket and they run hard for the second
full, almost yorker length, squeezed square from in front of leg stump, Jadeja sets off, stutters as Finn runs in, moves to run again as he misfields but eventually returns to his crease
full bunger on the pads again, manages to squirt this in front of square leg for a single

slower ball, bit of a legcutter, top-edged straight up... Ashwin is outtathere! Stokes is all smiles (and freckles), duped the batsman there, woolly heave across the line and Finn it was again taking the catch in the covers, falling flat on his back in relief
full on leg again, this has been a very good over, Jadeja clips a final single through midwicket
full and leg side again, Jadeja glances to square leg, where Moeen Ali falls over while fielding
good length, on the stumps, jerky defensive push from Bhuvnesh
dug in, whippy bouncer from Woakes, Bhuvnesh half-crouches, half-limbos underneath it
pitched up in the channel, lofted down the ground towards long-off
full length outside off, hits powerfully through the line but sends the ball scudding straight to mid-off on the bounce
full outside off again, chops down on it, squeezes one towards mid-off - another solid over from England

England hitting their marks here, Jadeja pushes off the pads and wants two again... but Bhuvnesh is struggling as the throw comes in from mid-on. Stokes was standing some way from the stumps, had to take the throw and then reach to break the wicket; Bhuvnesh is short, by a cat's whisker, India eight down
pitched up and Jadeja backs away, swats a single down the ground
short ball, at the batsman, Shami takes evasive action
full toss, Shami miscues it to cover! That was a filthy delivery, met with a filthier shot - can't have been far away from a no-ball but Shami sliced it, barely off the square, simple catch for Hales
good length on off stump, Yadav leans out and punches a drive towards mid-off
length delivery, Yadav manfully presses forward to defend on off stump
superb yorker, on leg stump, Jadeja does well to jam down on it
full ball, clears the front leg... and mows it over long-off! Plenty of venom in that, though a bit late in the piece. Jadeja does his sword dance upon reaching fifty
full length, outside off, can't get this one away

goes big again... in fact, goes ENORMOUS! Gets right under the attempted yorker, leans back like an Olympic hammer thrower, sends this into orbit out towards wide long-on. Brilliant hitting, though might have been useful a few overs ago
short ball, pulled through wide long-on and they come racing back for two
turns one more square on the leg side
full and wide, Jadeja spears a drive through the covers, gets it into a gap and that will be four more
another four, full toss swung towards fine leg, where the ball bobbles slightly and throws Woakes a dummy, skips past him to the boundary
good yorker in response, right up in the blockhole
full length, clubbed away between deep midwicket and long-on... They get back for two
another boundary, third in the over! This is a terrific shot, backed away and laced a drive through extra cover, another punch to the solar plexus
short ball, outside leg, paddled behind square to the man on the fence, who fields it this time
full and slightly wide, Jadeja makes room and cracks a drive to mid-off, could have been one but Sir Jaddu wants more
short ball, rising up around the ears, pulled down to fine leg and there's again no run
banged in short, pulled down to fine leg - dot ball. Curious approach, this
steps away and slogs a slower ball to midwicket, again turns down a single
picks the slower ball this time, carts it over midwicket, bounces in front of the rope and beats deep square leg running around
full on leg stump, swats one down to fine leg - new career best in ODIs for Jadeja
short ball, on leg stump, pulls through square and turns down the single again
length ball outside off, steps away and flays the ball wide of mid-off for another boundary
more clean striking, short and slightly wide, clubbed over point by the free-swinging Jaddu
steps away to leg, Finn follows him, Jadeja weaves his hips out of the way and takes the wide

bowled him, Jadeja chops on! A strange dismissal, in keeping with the last few overs, really... Jadeja got well outside leg, the ball was fired in full and he effectively defended the ball on to his stumps. Finn bellows in celebration, a second wicket for him wraps up a 41-run win for England
